```{r}

setwd("C:/Users/senan/OneDrive/Documents/Masters in Computing in Computer Animation/DAIE/GCA_GAD_and_VR_Group7")

dataFromControl <- read.csv("GROUP_7_2023_GCA_RESULTS_CONTROL.csv")
dataFromExperimental <- read.csv("GROUP_7_2023_GCA_RESULTS_EXPERIMENTAL.csv")

### Here the Control data is cleaned up to remove any values that are not possible - i.e GAD scores less than 0 or above 21 and STAI scores less than 20 and greater than 80
cleanControl = dataFromControl
cleanControl <- cleanControl[cleanControl$pretrial_GAD >= 0 & cleanControl$pretrial_GAD <= 21, ]
cleanControl <- cleanControl[cleanControl$posttrial_GAD >= 0 & cleanControl$posttrial_GAD <= 21, ]
cleanControl <- cleanControl[cleanControl$pretrial_STAI >= 20 & cleanControl$pretrial_STAI <= 80, ]
cleanControl <- cleanControl[cleanControl$posttrial_STAI >= 20 & cleanControl$posttrial_STAI <= 80, ]

### The above is repeated for the Experimental Data
cleanExperimental = dataFromExperimental
cleanExperimental <- cleanExperimental[cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD >= 0 & cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD <= 21, ]
cleanExperimental <- cleanExperimental[cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD >= 0 & cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD <= 21, ]
cleanExperimental <- cleanExperimental[cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI >= 20 & cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI <= 80, ]
cleanExperimental <- cleanExperimental[cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI >= 20 & cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI <= 80, ]

### A column containing the difference between the pre & post trial scores is created for both the Control and Experimental data for compararative analysis
cleanControl["GAD_differenceCol"] <- cleanControl$pretrial_GAD - cleanControl$posttrial_GAD
cleanControl["STAI_differenceCol"] <- cleanControl$pretrial_STAI - cleanControl$posttrial_STAI
cleanExperimental["GAD_differenceCol"] <- cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD - cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD
cleanExperimental["STAI_differenceCol"] <- cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI - cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI

# Calculations
meanControlDiff_GAD <- mean(cleanControl$GAD_differenceCol)
meanExperimentalDiff_GAD <- mean(cleanExperimental$GAD_differenceCol)
sdControlDiff_GAD <- sd(cleanControl$GAD_differenceCol)
sdExperimentalDiff_GAD <- sd(cleanExperimental$GAD_differenceCol)
#GAD_tScore <- 




sd(cleanControl$pretrial_GAD)
sd(cleanControl$posttrial_GAD)
length(cleanControl$patientID)
shapiro.test(cleanControl$pretrial_GAD)
shapiro.test(cleanControl$posttrial_GAD)
shapiro.test(cleanControl$pretrial_STAI)
shapiro.test(cleanControl$posttrial_STAI)
mean(cleanControl$pretrial_STAI)
mean(cleanControl$posttrial_STAI)
sd(cleanControl$pretrial_STAI)
sd(cleanControl$posttrial_STAI)

#EXPERIMENTAL CALCS
mean(cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD)
mean(cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD)
sd(cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD)
sd(cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD)
length(cleanExperimental$patientID)
shapiro.test(cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD)
shapiro.test(cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD)
mean(cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI)
mean(cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI)
sd(cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI)
sd(cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI)
length(cleanExperimental$patientID)
shapiro.test(cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI)
shapiro.test(cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI)


#CONTROL PLOTS
boxplot(cleanControl$pretrial_GAD,cleanControl$posttrial_GAD)
boxplot(cleanControl$pretrial_STAI,cleanControl$posttrial_STAI)
plot(density(cleanControl$pretrial_GAD))
plot(density(cleanControl$posttrial_GAD))
plot(density(cleanControl$pretrial_STAI))
plot(density(cleanControl$posttrial_STAI))

#EXPERIMENTAL PLOTS
boxplot(cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD,cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD)
boxplot(cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI,cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI)
plot(density(cleanExperimental$pretrial_GAD))
plot(density(cleanExperimental$posttrial_GAD))
plot(density(cleanExperimental$pretrial_STAI))
plot(density(cleanExperimental$posttrial_STAI))


summary(cleanControl)
summary(cleanExperimental)
```
